    ps_3_0
    def c3, 0.5, 1.5, 2.5, 0.25
    def c4, 0, 1, -1, -0.999000013
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyw
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1

def c220, 0, 1, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s15


// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -I ../../.. --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 -f 83C117BA.txt

mov r7.xyw, v0
add r31.w, r7.w, -r31.y
mad r7.x, r31.w, r31.x, r7.x

    rcp r0.x, r7.w
    mul r0.xy, r0.x, r7
    mad r1.xy, r0, c1, c1.wzzw
    mov r1.zw, c4.x
    texldl r1, r1, s0
    mov r1.yz, c4
    add r0.z, r1.y, -c2.y
    add r0.z, -r0.z, r1.w
    rcp r0.z, r0.z
    mul r0.z, r0.z, -c2.x
    mul r0.xy, r0.z, r0
    mul r2, r0.y, c13

// Unreal Engine shadow fix inserted with DarkStarSword's shadertool.py:
// shadertool.py -I ../../.. --auto-fix-unreal-shadows --stereo-sampler-ps=s15 -f 83C117BA.txt

mad r0.x, -r31.w, r31.x, r0.x

    mad r2, c12, r0.x, r2
    mad r2, c14, r0.z, r2
    add r2, r2, c15
    rcp r0.w, r2.w
    mul r1.xw, r0.w, r2.xyzy
    max r0.w, c4.w, -r2.z
    mul r2.xy, r1.xwzw, c18
    mad r1.xw, r1, c18.xyzy, r1.z
    frc r2.xy, r2
    add r1.xw, r1, -r2.xyzy
    add r3, r1.xwxw, c3.xxxy
    mul r3, r3, c19.xyxy
    mul r4, r3.xyxx, c4.yyxx
    mul r3, r3.zwxx, c4.yyxx
    texldl r3, r3, s1
    add r2.z, r0.w, r3.x
    mad_sat r3.y, r2.z, c18.z, r1.y
    texldl r4, r4, s1
    add r2.z, r0.w, r4.x
    mad_sat r3.x, r2.z, c18.z, r1.y

    mul r4, r4, c19.xyxy
    mul r5, r4.xyxx, c4.yyxx
    mul r4, r4.zwxx, c4.yyxx
    texldl r4, r4, s1
    add r2.z, r0.w, r4.x
    mad_sat r4.x, r2.z, c18.z, r1.y
    texldl r5, r5, s1
    add r2.z, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r3.z, r2.z, c18.z, r1.y
    add r5, r1.xwxw, c3.yyyz
    mul r5, r5, c19.xyxy
    mul r6, r5.xyxx, c4.yyxx
    mul r5, r5.zwxx, c4.yyxx
    texldl r5, r5, s1
    add r2.z, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r4.z, r2.z, c18.z, r1.y
    texldl r5, r6, s1
    add r2.z, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r4.y, r2.z, c18.z, r1.y
    lrp r5, r2.x, r4.xyyz, r3.xyyz
    lrp r3.xy, r2.y, r5.ywzw, r5.xzzw
    add r2.z, r3.y, r3.x
    add r3.xy, r1.xwzw, c3.z
    add r5, r1.xwxw, c3.zxzy
    mul r5, r5, c19.xyxy
    mul r3.xy, r3, c19
    mov r3.zw, c4.x
    texldl r3, r3, s1
    add r1.x, r0.w, r3.x
    mad_sat r3.z, r1.x, c18.z, r1.y
    mul r6, r5.xyxx, c4.yyxx
    mul r5, r5.zwxx, c4.yyxx
    texldl r5, r5, s1
    add r1.x, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r3.y, r1.x, c18.z, r1.y
    texldl r5, r6, s1
    add r0.w, r0.w, r5.x
    mad_sat r3.x, r0.w, c18.z, r1.y
    lrp r5, r2.x, r3.xyyz, r4.xyyz
    lrp r1.xy, r2.y, r5.ywzw, r5.xzzw
    add r0.w, r1.x, r2.z
    add r0.w, r1.y, r0.w
    mul_sat_pp r0.w, r0.w, c3.w
    mul r0.w, r0.w, r0.w
    mul r1.xyw, r0.y, c9.xyzz
    mad r1.xyw, c8.xyzz, r0.x, r1
    mad r0.xyz, c10, r0.z, r1.xyww
    add r0.xyz, r0, c11
    add r0.xyz, -r0, c16
    mul r0.xyz, r0, c16.w
    dp3 r0.x, r0, r0
    rsq r0.x, r0.x
    rcp r0.x, r0.x
    mad r0.x, r0.x, c17.y, c17.z
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.x
    mad r0.x, r1.x, -r1.x, c4.y
    max r1.x, r0.x, c4.x
    pow_pp r0.x, r1.x, c17.x
    add r1, r1.z, c0
    mad r1, r0.x, r1, c4.y
    add r2, -r1, c4.y
    mad oC0, r0.w, r2, r1
